body:
Dear Anto,



I posted a question about the absence of the "percentage of surface area" option in the latest Generator PV component:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/why-the-per...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/why-the-percentage-of-surface-area-option-is-removed-from-the?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1576380&xg_source=msg_com_gr_forum)



Hope you can kindly advise.



Thank you very much!
